item.title: Servius Heiner add a quote by Al Capone
item.description: "You can get more with a kind word and a gun, then you can with just a kind word." -- Al Capone

item.title: Servius Heiner add a quote by Ayn Rand
item.description: "A government is the most dangerous threat to man's rights: it holds a legal monopoly on the use of physical force against legally disarmed victims." -- Ayn Rand

item.title: Servius Heiner add a quote by Ayn Rand
item.description: "Run for your life from any man who tells you that money is evil. That sentence is the leper's bell of an approaching looter." -- Ayn Rand

item.title: Servius Heiner add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Now at this very moment I knew that the United States was in the war, up to the neck and in to the death. So we had won after all! ... How long the war would last or in what fashion it would end no man could tell, nor did I at this moment care ... We should not be wiped out. Our history would not come to an end ... Hitler's fate was sealed. Mussolini's fate was sealed. As for the Japanese, they would be ground to a powder. All the rest was merely the proper application of overwhelming force." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Servius Heiner add a quote by adolf hitler
item.description: "If you tell a big enough lie and tell it frequently enough, it will be believed." -- adolf hitler

item.title: Servius Heiner add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Servius Heiner add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "The story so far: In the beginning the Universe was created. This has made a lot of people very angry and been widely regarded as a bad move." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Servius Heiner add a quote by Charles Schultz
item.description: "<b>I</b> love mankind ... it's <b>people</b> I can't stand!!" -- Charles Schultz

item.title: Servius Heiner add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "If you're looking for sympathy you'll find it between shit and syphilis in the dictionary." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Servius Heiner add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "The difference between genius and stupidity is; genius has its limits." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Servius Heiner add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "When you are courting a nice girl an hour seems like a second. When you sit on a red-hot cinder a second seems like an hour. That's relativity." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Servius Heiner add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Everything must be made as simple as possible. But not simpler." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Servius Heiner add a quote by Michio Kaku
item.description: "It is often stated that of all the theories proposed in this century, the silliest is quantum theory. In fact, some say that the only thing that quantum theory has going for it is that it is unquestionably correct." -- Michio Kaku

item.title: Servius Heiner add a quote by James Bovard
item.description: "Democracy must be something more than two wolves and a sheep voting on what to have for dinner." -- James Bovard
